testcase.name: SOAP API testing
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/tempconvert.asmx" ................ passed And header Content-Type = "text/xml; charset=utf-8" ....................... passed And request ............................................................... passed When soap action "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/CelsiusToFahrenheit" ...... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response contains "98.6" ........................................ passed * match response //CelsiusToFahrenheitResponse/CelsiusToFahrenheitResult == "98.6" . passed * match responseHeaders['Server'] == ['Microsoft-IIS/7.5'] ................ passed * match responseHeaders['Server'][0] == 'Microsoft-IIS/7.5' ............... passed * assert responseTime <= 2000 ............................................. passed
